extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A minimum grade of C in PSYC301 and registration in a PSYC Major Plan. 
Exclusion     No more than 6.0 units from PSYC300; PSYC301; PSYC302.

basic.description:
The application of previous statistical and methodological courses (continuation of PSYC 202/PSYC 203/PSYC 301) toward the design, execution, analysis, and communication of a research project. Lectures and laboratories cover data collection, data management, some advanced statistical analyses, and communication skills.
NOTE    Enrollment is limited. Restricted to students in a PSYC Major Plan. Required for admission to PSYC 501/9.0.
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Advanced Research Methods
